Headline: The EV tax credit expires today — and time’s running out to save money on these other green upgrades. Here’s what to do.
Summary: Time is not on the side of anyone seeking help from Uncle Sam with their electric-vehicle purchase or their home’s clean-energy upgrades.

Headline: This chart shows the U.S. labor market is running on fumes. Why that’s a risk for the stock market.
Summary: A weakening U.S. labor market is a risk for both the U.S. economy and markets right now. But the most closely watched numbers — the rate of new jobs created, and the official unemployment rate — don’t tell the full story.

Headline: You won’t get a paper Social Security check in October — or ever again. Here’s how you’ll be paid instead.
Summary: About 500,000 people were still getting paper checks — including people over age 80, living with disabilities or without internet access.

Headline: This stock and bond strategy is so disliked — and it’s probably your best investment move for the next 10 years
Summary: In the past, when the market was overvalued as it is now, a 60/40 portfolio almost always beat the S&P 500 over the subsequent decade.

Headline: You’ve got less than 5 years to rescue your money from AI and stablecoins. Here’s what to do.
Summary: America’s once-a-century reset is happening at hyperspeed — creating new fortunes and destroying old ones.

Headline: What to know about October’s market-crash potential — and what you can ignore
Summary: What to know about October’s market-crash potential — and what you can ignore.

Headline: Throwing money at our broken healthcare system won’t fix it — but this solution might
Summary: Making hospitals more efficient brings cost savings — but hospitals and Congress look the other way.

Headline: These TikTok and Instagram financial influencers aren’t your father’s investment advisers
Summary: In a world where young people get information from entirely different sources than older folks, it’s no wonder that they have different views on money — how to save it, how to spend it and how to get rich.

Headline: The biggest risk to Fed independence is a divided Congress — not Trump
Summary: The question for investors now is how much power over the Fed the Senate will cede to the president.

Headline: Kroger’s delivery expansion with DoorDash is bad news for Instacart, analysts say
Summary: Shares of grocery-delivery app Instacart slid Monday after rival DoorDash Inc. and supermarket giant Kroger Co. said they were expanding an existing partnership to deliver a lot more groceries to consumers’ homes starting next month.
